title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it can be observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it can be observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The flashing behavior of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should be minimized or eliminated when resizing the window.
SR:
1. Launch the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe the excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
